placeholder_otp: Enter the verification code in the following form
info_lensa: For customer that not used eye check in
force_login_title: Your account has been logged in on another device
history_check: Your past scan for glasses specification
empty_check_mata: There is no stored eye check data yet
pupil_intro_title: You will do a pupil scan

pupil_intro_subtitle2: For more accurate data, you can enter data manually
pupil_outro_ask: Have you had eye tests before?
pupil_outro_title: You will be doing a series of eye health tests.
pupil_outro_instruction: Hold your device +50 cm or the size of an arm.
manualA: Use a ruler or other measuring instrument to manually measure the required distance and height
manualB: Use a ruler or other measuring instrument to manually measure the required distance and height
manualC: Use a ruler or other measuring instrument to manually measure the required distance and height
manualD: Use a ruler or other measuring instrument to manually measure the required distance and height
check_mata_instructionA: Please turn off your room lights
duochrome_ask:
Letters on a red background or on a green background
where is blacker?
duochrome_answerA: The letters on a red background are blacker
duochrome_answerB: The letters on a green background are blacker
duochrome_answerC:
Same black on a red or green
background
wording_E_desc: For customers who have not been able to read
wording_C_desc: For customers who have not been able to read
progresif: Meets the criteria for progressive lenses
pressed_to_close: Press back again to close the apps
select_lens: Your choice may not match the eyeglass frame
size_info: Rim Width - Distance between Right and Left Rim - Length of shaft / leg - Height of Rim
other_lens: You can add the lens that suits you by selecting the available lens
help_center_subtitle: Contact our support service via email, Whatsapp or telephone
addon_desc: You can add lenses that suit you to get a suitable set of glasses by selecting the available lenses or if you want to buy frames only, save the product to the basket without selecting lenses
frame_without_lens: Buy a frame without a lens?
choose_lens_size: Choose the way you get the most suitable lens size for you
pupil_instruction: Adjust your eye position on the white striped area
capture_pupil: Tap anywhere to pick up a picture of your pupil
capture_image: Press anywhere to take a picture
visual_acuity_info: This test is more useful for plus and minus eyes, not for cylinders
ask_outro_visual_acuity: How long have you been active in front of a computer screen?
